songs.title: Toxic (Bloodshy & Avant’s Intoxicated Remix)
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
(I think I'm ready now)
(I  think I'm ready now)

[Verse 1]
Baby,  can't you see I'm calling?
A guy like you should wear a warning
It's dangerous, I'm falling
There's  no escape, I can't wait
I  need a hit, baby, give me it
You're dangerous, I'm lovin' it

[Pre-Chorus 1]
Too  high, can't come down
Losing my head, spinnin' 'round and 'round
Do you feel me now?

[Chorus]
With a taste of your lips, I'm on a ride
You're  toxic, I'm slippin' under
With a taste of a poison paradise
I'm addicted to you
Don't you know that you're toxic?
And I love what you do
Don't you know that you're toxic?
Toxic! (toxic, toxic, toxic, toxic, toxic, toxic)

[Verse 2]
It's getting late to give you up
I took a sip from my devil's cup
Slowly, it's taking over me

[Pre-Chorus 2]
Too high, can't come down
It's in the air and it's all around
Can you feel me now?

[Chorus]
With a taste of your lips, I'm on a ride
You're toxic, I'm slippin' under
With a taste of a poison paradise
I'm addicted to you
Don't you know that you're toxic?
With a taste of your lips, I'm on a ride
You're toxic, I'm slippin' under
With a taste of a poison paradise
I'm addicted to you
Don't you know that you're toxic?
And I love what you do
Don't you know that you're toxic?
Don't you know that you're toxic?
Toxic! (toxic, toxic, toxic, toxic, toxic, toxic)
(I think I'm ready now)
Toxic! (toxic, toxic, toxic, toxic, toxic, toxic)

[Ins]

[Chorus]
(Taste of your lips, I'm on a ride)
You're toxic, I'm slippin' under
With a taste of a poison paradise
I'm addicted to you
Don't you know that you're toxic?
With a taste of your lips, I'm on a ride
You're toxic, I'm slippin' under (Toxic)
With a taste of a poison paradise
I'm addicted to you
Don't you know that you're toxic?

[Break]
Intoxicate me now with your lovin' now
I think I'm ready now (I think I'm ready now)
Intoxicate me now with your lovin' now
I think I'm ready now

[Chorus]
Toxic! (toxic, toxic, toxic, toxic, toxic, toxic)
(Taste of your lips, I'm on a ride)
Don't you know that you're toxic?
(Toxic, toxic, toxic, toxic, toxic)
(I think I'm ready now)

[Break]
Intoxicate me now with your lovin' now
I think I'm ready now (Toxic)
Intoxicate me now with your lovin' now
I think I'm ready now
Intoxicate me now
With your lovin' now
I think I'm ready now
(I think I'm- toxic!)
(Toxic, toxic, toxic, toxic)
Intoxicate me now
With your lovin' now
I think I'm ready now
(Taste of your lips, I'm on a, on a, on a, on a)
Intoxicate me now
With your lovin' now
I think I'm ready now
Don't you know that you're toxic?
(Toxic, toxic, toxic, toxic, toxic, toxic)

[Outro]
Intoxicate me now
With your lovin' now
I think I'm ready now
